      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
        Handles button clicks in the action bar

        When a user clicks a button, actionBarController is called with the item, where the request is handled by calling controllers for other models/views.

        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity

      • onIdentityCreate

        public void onIdentityCreate(java.lang.String userName)
        Takes the user name and updates the user model.

        An onIdentityCreate is received only when creating a new UserModel.
